title: Systems and methods to generate a self-confined high density air plasma

events.title: Application filed by University of Missouri Columbia

classifications.description: Generating plasma using exploding wires or spark gaps

abstract: The present invention relates to methods and apparatus for generating high electron density air plasmas at atmospheric pressure. In particular, the present invention relates to self-contained toroidal air plasmas. Methods and apparatus have been developed for generating atmospheric toroidal air plasmas. The air plasma is self-limiting, can be projected and requires no additional support equipment to form.
abstract_original: 本发明涉及用于在大气压下产生高电子密度空气等离子体的方法和装置。具体地说，本发明涉及自含式环形空气等离子体。已开发出用于产生大气环形空气等离子体的方法和设备。所述空气等离子体是自限的，可以投射并且形成时不要求另外的支持装备。
claims:
1. under atmospheric pressure producing a method for self-contained air plasma, described method comprises:
      In the first ignition zone, produce described air plasma;
      Limit the radial expansion of described air plasma; And
      High-voltage pulse is applied on the described air plasma in two-stage ignition region, and wherein said high-voltage pulse makes described air plasma volume expansion, accelerates to leave described the second ignition zone, and becomes self-contained.

2. the method for claim 1, wherein said air plasma is to produce and at least a member of the group that described plasma source is comprised of the following from plasma source: the plasma source of quick-fried silk, explosive, jet plasma, hollow cathode plasma, laser, railgun, ultrahigh speed plasma source and microwave-driven.

3. the method for claim 1, the radial expansion that wherein limits described air plasma further comprises:
      Shielding material is arranged on to described air plasma body source around, the expansion of described air plasma is concentrated on in described the first ignition zone direction parallel with the longitudinal axis of described the second ignition zone.

4. the method for claim 1, is wherein applied to described air plasma by described high-voltage pulse and further comprises:
      Apply described high-voltage pulse and make it pass negative pole and the electrode being separated by air gap, wherein said air plasma has completed the circuit between described negative pole and described electrode.
5. method as claimed in claim 4, wherein said air plasma accelerates to leave described negative pole and described electrode and forms self-limited type structure.
6. method as claimed in claim 5, wherein said self-limited type structure is loop configuration or sphere structure.

7. the method for claim 1, wherein said self-contained air plasma has at least 10
          10/ cm
          3electron density.

9. equipment as claimed in claim 8, at least a member of the group that wherein said plasma source is comprised of the following: the plasma source of quick-fried silk, laser, explosive, jet plasma, hollow cathode plasma, railgun, ultrahigh speed plasma source and microwave-driven.
10. equipment as claimed in claim 8, wherein said second longitudinal cavity is that columniform and described self-contained air plasma forms self-limited type structure.
11. equipment as claimed in claim 10, wherein said self-limited type structure is loop configuration or sphere structure.

12. equipment as claimed in claim 8, wherein said self-contained air plasma has at least 10
          10/ cm
          3or higher electron density.

14. methods as claimed in claim 13, further comprise:
      Rigid electric insulating material is arranged between described positive pole and described negative pole, and described material has defined the described radial expansion that limits described air plasma around the elongate cavity of described silk thread and described elongate cavity.
15. methods as claimed in claim 14, wherein said elongate cavity has the structure of general cylindrical.
16. methods as claimed in claim 14, wherein said elongate cavity has spiral structure substantially.

17. methods as claimed in claim 14, described method further comprises:
      The second rigid electric insulating material is arranged between described negative pole and described accelerator electrode, and described the second material has defined the second elongate cavity to receive described air plasma.
18. methods as claimed in claim 17, wherein said the second elongate cavity has than the larger diameter of described the first elongate cavity.
19. methods as claimed in claim 17, wherein said the second elongate cavity has than the less diameter of described the first elongate cavity.
20. methods as claimed in claim 17, wherein said the second elongate cavity has the structure of general cylindrical.
21. methods as claimed in claim 17, wherein said the second elongate cavity has spiral structure substantially.
22. methods as claimed in claim 13, wherein said silk thread has the wire gauge within the scope of 00 wire gauge and 80 wire gauges.
23. methods as claimed in claim 13, wherein said the first high-voltage pulse is between 10kV and 50kV and have a duration between 10 μ s and 200ms.
24. methods as claimed in claim 13, wherein said the second high-voltage pulse is between 100V and 300V and have a duration between 1ms and 200ms.

25. methods as claimed in claim 13, wherein said self-contained annular air plasma has at least 10
          10/ cm
          3electron density.

27. equipment as claimed in claim 26, wherein said second longitudinal cavity be general cylindrical and have than the described first larger diameter of longitudinal cavity so that described self-contained air plasma forms loop configuration when crossing described electrode.

28. equipment as claimed in claim 26, wherein said self-contained air plasma has at least 10
          10/ cm
          3or higher electron density.

29. 1 kinds under atmospheric pressure producing the method for self-contained air plasma, and described method comprises:
      In the first ignition zone, produce described air plasma;
      The speed of expansion of described air plasma is drawn to described first area; And
      By energy, give the described air plasma in two-stage ignition region, the wherein said energy of giving makes described air plasma volume expansion, accelerates to leave described the second ignition zone, and becomes self-contained.

30. 1 kinds under atmospheric pressure producing the method for self-contained air plasma, and described method comprises:
      In the first ignition zone, produce described air plasma;
      Limit the radial expansion of described air plasma; And
      By energy, give the described air plasma in two-stage ignition region, the wherein said energy of giving makes described air plasma volume expansion, accelerates to leave described the second ignition zone, and becomes self-contained.
